channel.title: Bobby hugges Surf videos
channel.description: The latest surf videos from southwest france,the big barrels from hossegor.

channel.itunes:author: Julien Salomon
channel.itunes:summary: The latest surf videos from southwest france (hossegor/capbreton)

item.title: hossegor winter surf
item.description: clean lines, frozen beach, pink sunsets, a classic winter vision in hossegor
item.itunes:author: Julien Salomon
item.itunes:subtitle: clean winter surf in december and january
item.itunes:summary: clean lines, frozen beach, pink sunsets, a classic winter vision in hossegor

item.title: quik pro 2005 - kelly slater and friends

item.title: tribute to Capbreton Hossegor Seignosse
item.description: a surfing video made for a quiksilver youtube contest, inspired by beastie boys open letter to nyc clip. shot in capbreton hossegor seignosse, france.surfers : arnaud darrigade,jeremy flores, miki picon, patrick beven, marc lacomare, vincent duvignac, thomas baché, jex debray, fredo robin,... and myself
item.itunes:author: Julien Salomon
item.itunes:subtitle: by julien salomon
item.itunes:summary: a surfing video made for a quiksilver youtube contest, inspired by beastie boys open letter to nyc clip. shot in capbreton hossegor seignosse, france.surfers : arnaud darrigade,jeremy flores, miki picon, patrick beven, marc lacomare, vincent duvignac, thomas baché, jex debray, fredo robin,... and myself

item.title: quiksilver pro france about to start
item.description: this was shot on 9/20/2006, just before the begining of the quiksilver pro france in hossegor.Many WCT stars like Fanning, Parko, Irons brothers, Jeremy Flores, freesurf la graviere. Enjoy..
